scripts.start: npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss --skip-generate && npx prisma generate && node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.start:prod: npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && node scripts/seedZones.js && node scripts/importProperties.js && node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.production
scripts.dev: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss --skip-generate && npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- npx prisma generate && node -r dotenv/config index.js dotenv_config_path=.env.local
scripts.migrate:local: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:prod: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.production -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push:local: npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- npx prisma db push
